analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/31/0x51cf271deceb13b1711a9b5108917f43ea65fd05.sol:
	Contract C64 has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x51cf271deceb13b1711a9b5108917f43ea65fd05.sol#197-199)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
